short_definition: A neutral word that indicates the killing of a human being by another human being, without giving any idea whether the killing was excusable or felonious.
long_definition_html: A neutral word that indicates the killing of a human being by another human being, without giving any idea whether the killing was excusable or felonious.
long_definition_markdown: A neutral word that indicates the killing of a human being by another human being, without giving any idea whether the killing was excusable or felonious.
long_definition_text: A neutral word that indicates the killing of a human being by another human being, without giving any idea whether the killing was excusable or felonious.
